text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE REGIONAL DIRECTOR
2151 Highland Avenue
Birmingham 5, Alabama
May 31, 1962
Mr. Harold E. Hill
Administrative Vice President
NAEB
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Harold:
I am setting up for next year's NAEB Region II conference. This requires
plans a long time in advance. In this connection, I would like to have
you check the list of active TV members in this region for me and add any
that I may have overlooked. The following list and the contact person
for each is submitted for your checking. Please make any corrections,
additions or deletions necessary.
Station
Location
Contact Person
VWAIQ-TV Montgomery, Alabama
vWBIQ-TV Birmingham, Alabama
WCIQ-TV Cheaha State Park
/WDIQ-TV Dozier, Alabama
Raymond D. Hurlbert
II

Haskell Boyter
vWGTV-TV Athens, Georgia
Gerard Appy
